author: Matt Walker
title: BBC - Earth - Large bees fight to death
text:
Large bees fight to death In a mating frenzy, males attack their own kind By Matt Walker 30 January 2017 
Watch the moment when Sir David Attenborough and BBC filmmakers recorded huge Dawson's bees attack one another. 
Even better, you can watch a further 1000 more memorable moments, for free, anytime, on your smartphone or tablet, via Attenborough's Story of Life app, which is now available to download via Google Play , or Apple's app store . 
Find out more at http://www.bbc.com/earth/storyoflife . 
The Story of Life has been produced in collaboration with Sir David Attenborough, BBC Earth and ideas and innovation company AKQA . Related Stories
